body.name: Conair Full Size Garment Steamer for Clothes, Turbo ExtremeSteam 1875W Professional Steam and Press
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 20 hrs 14 mins
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 21 hrs 14 mins
features: Upright Steamer: The professional 1875 watt steam generator in this fabric steamer powers away wrinkles and has an innovative multi-garment hanger, ideal for clothing, linens, drapes, and bedding.

Easy to Use: This full size steamer features 1.8 liter water tank for up to 90 minutes of steam time. Built-In safety feature will stop steam for a moment with steam pause and auto shut off. Anti-calcification filter allows for use of normal tap water.

Custom Height, Compact Storage: This full size fabric steamer has a telescoping pole that easily adjusts to a comfortable, custom height for easy pressing. Includes Removable Attachments: Silicone Band, Bristle Brush, Delicate Fabric Spacer,and Creaser.

Conair Fabric Steamers: Our garment steamers have earned the Good Housekeeping Seal and keep your clothing, upholstery, curtains and other home fabrics smooth and fresh. Check out entire line including handheld, upright and travel steamers.
Innovative Garment Care: From fabric shavers and traditional irons to garment steamers, both handheld and full size, we make high-quality garment care accessories.
body.description: Keep your clothes looking pressed and smelling fresh with the Turbo ExtremeSteam Professional Steam & Press with Turbo by Conair. Engineered with 1875 watts of intense power, this standing valet garment steamer produces 40% hotter steam,† has a dual-slotted soleplate for faster smoothing, and provides up to 90 minutes of strong steam that kills 99.9% of bacteria.* De-wrinkle and freshen clothing, curtains, linens, and more with 2 steam settings maximized for a variety of fabrics. An innovative multi-garment hanger queues up garments and swivels 360°, making clothing simple to steam at any angle and fresh-from-the-dry-cleaner results easy to achieve. Two-wheeled portability, an anti-calcification water filter, auto shutoff and a Steam Pause safety feature plus a set of finishing accessories add to a flawless pressing experience! *Based on third-party test report for efficacy on E. coli when used in accordance with enclosed instructions. †Compared to other similar Conair handheld steamers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Works really good. Great steam. Just when it’s in the cradle it does not steam. I don’t think it says that in the instructions you have to take off the cradle for it to steam. Other then that works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic steamer - love Conair
reviews.reviewText: I bought a Conair several years ago that finally died, and I have to say the upgrades added since my last one are incredible. I love that the water tank lasts longer because the steam doesn't come out when the steamer is resting on the stand, but I also gave it a 4 star easy to use rating because I didn't realize this. My box didn't come with instructions, so I was about ready to return it because I had been waiting for the steam to start before I picked up the steamer head. Overall, Conair thought of everything to make this a great product. Highly recommend for home use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not exactly durable (update)
reviews.reviewText: So the pros first.-Does the job perfectly before today. Powerful steam and rids all wrinkles my clothing can muster.Cons:-The attachment parts for the head have manufacturing errors that don't fit and attach to the steamers head. So they are totally useless. No big deal because I don't really need them.-The steamer head developed a rust looking dirt on the steam vent, about two weeks into owning it. Did not develop further and did not interfere with function.-Almost a full year now and the rust looking thing spread like crazy in the past 4 days. Today I turned it on and it started to release a rust color fluid from the steaming vents onto my clothing. I have another conair steamer that is full of calcium build up and that one still functions 100% without any issues despite the build up. It is over 8 years old. Was expecting at least 5 years out of this one for the price it cost me. Now I am looking to see what is happening and how to fix it. I want to retire the old one already but I need a trust worthy replacement. If I am forced to replace this newer one I can't say I trust Conair anymore and will look for another brand and risk it. Without knowing what the rust color abnormalities are, I can't say I recommend this product at all.Bought 09/29/2021 it is now 02/21/2023 and the steamer died. After coughing up the rust looking thing everyday since it started I managed to use it avoiding staining my clothing. Until now, preparing my clothing for work it just, didn't work. Didn't want to steam. I am now switching to an old Conair steamer that looks like it came from some apocalyptic movie, the thing is decades old, that still works. Sad, they don't make them like they use to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Loving it so far! Had an older model that lasted over 10 years. hoping this does too n

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing!!! Lots of steam
reviews.reviewText: I don’t write reviews very often, but I thought this was worthy of one. I used to have the older model and I went through two of them. They were amazing. When my last one broke, I chose to try another brand, which I deeply regretted, so I purchased this newer model of the conair. I hoped it would at least live up to the same standards as the prior model. Fortunately, it exceeded my expectations. I love the new features with this model. It has a bar to clip your clothes that extends out words, which is a nice touch. Also, when you place the handheld device back on the resting spot, it stops the steam automatically. This is a very powerful machine. I purchased it just a few days before my sons wedding. The entire wedding party used it. The gentleman used it to steam their shirts and freshen up there suits and all the ladies used it to eliminate any wrinkles out of their dresses. Everyone told me how amazing this machine was. I would definitely recommend this steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this product!! It’s made chores so much more enjoyable. Very easy to assemble and use. Even without help from the manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Update: Unfortunately the steamer does not work at all anymore! It only lasted a year I believe at best before it comes tanked. It was a great convenience gone wrong sadly to say….Totally happy with my purchase the steamer is so much easier than an iron! Heats up quickly and really gets the wrinkles out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lack of steam after a year
reviews.reviewText: I am using this machine once a week for shirt and pants and after a year of use the steam started to decrease considerably so I am not sure why but I would recommend you to see option with warranty more than a year.
No cumple con mis expectativas, no plancha telas de algodón, ni las de lino, pesa mucho el cabezal.

Muy mal producto llegó en tiempo ,lamentablemente era para un obsequio y cuando la pusieron en funcionamiento no sirvió para nada ósea venia descompuesta porque no prende estaba inservible con todo y el manual nunca lograron poner la en función desgraciadamente ya no pude reclamar la garantía pues ya había pasado el tiempo para hacer la devolución no la compren .

reviews.reviewTitle: Dejo de pasar agua, no salía vapor y sonaba Tac Tac l
reviews.reviewText: Me salió mal, dejo de pasar agua del repositorio a la plancha, empezó a sonar Tac Tac Tac, dejo de hechar vapor, esto fue cuando le cambié el agua, de suerte fue antes que venviñciara el tiempo para entregarla
